title: Those Who Wait
description: When Cheryl Trinidad's lover Mickey runs off with another woman, Mickey's sister Elaine is quick to offer support. Secretly in love with Cheryl for years, Elaine hopes she'll finally have a chance to win Cheryl's heart. But will she? Mickey's fling will soon be over and she'll want Cheryl back...in the worst way.
author: Peggy J. Herring
